Uses of Class
net.proteusframework.data.filesystem.StreamStorage

  • Packages that use StreamStorage 
    Package Description
    net.proteusframework.data.filesystem
    Classes for accessing a generic filesystem.

    • Uses of StreamStorage in net.proteusframework.data.filesystem

      Subclasses of StreamStorage in net.proteusframework.data.filesystem 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DatabaseStreamStorage
      Implements stream storage using the DataSourceStreamManager which stores streams as chunks in a single table.
      class  NativeStreamStorage
      Implements stream storage on the local disk using the native filesystem through File and related API.
      Methods in net.proteusframework.data.filesystem that return StreamStorage 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      StreamStorage FileSystemDAO.getEffectiveStreamStorage(FileSystemEntity fse)
      Get the effective stream storage module for the entity.
      StreamStorage StreamStorageChangeRequest.getStorage()
      Get the stream storage module to move the data into.
      StreamStorage FileSystemEntity.getStreamStorage()
      Get the default stream storage module for files in this directory.
      Methods in net.proteusframework.data.filesystem that return types with arguments of type StreamStorage 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Collection<StreamStorage> FileSystemDAO.getAvailableStreamStorageForRoot(FileSystemEntity root)
      Get the available stream storage modules for the root, or the root of the argument if the argument is not a root.
      Methods in net.proteusframework.data.filesystem with parameters of type StreamStorage 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void FileSystemDAO.changeStorage(StreamStorage newStorage, Collection<FileSystemEntity> fseList, Principal initator, boolean moveExisting)
      Change the stream storage module for a collection of file system entities.
      void FileSystemDAO.changeStorage(StreamStorage storage, FileEntity file)
      Move the data for the file to another stream storage module.
      void FileSystemDAO.changeStorage(StreamStorage storage, FileEntity file, boolean forceUncompressed)
      Move the data for the file to another stream storage module.
      void FileSystemDAO.delete(StreamStorage ss)
      Remove a stream storage module.
      void FileSystemDAO.save(StreamStorage ss, FileSystemEntity root)
      Save a StreamStorage module for the given file system entity root.
      void StreamStorageChangeRequest.setStorage(StreamStorage storage)
      Set the stream storage module to move the data into.
      void FileSystemEntity.setStreamStorage(StreamStorage streamStorage)
      set the default stream storage module for files in this directory.
